properties.name: httpmethod
properties.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET etc.

properties.name: datareader
properties.description: Key in JSON Datasource for records.

properties.name: displayfield
properties.description: Key in JSON for display particular column from data.

properties.name: enablecheckbox
properties.description: Enables checkbox for each row, this allows user for multi selection.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: Enables user to filter data based on 'displayfield' configured.

events.name: selectedRows
events.description: It will fire only on selection of checkbox and gives you selected record data.

events.name: rowClick
events.description: It will gives you row clicked data.
